attribute.name: footer-content
attribute.value: HomeFellas offers the best listing & reviews of Home Improvement Remodeling Contractors & Service Pro. We also offer Home related news , daily tips and some of the best and most relevant articles offering advise and information for your home improvement - Repair needs. Ask for free pro advise on our Contractor Talk forums and a professional will get back to you with guidance on your question. Last but not the least we are unveiling a revolutionary new feature that will save you the hassle & time. You can now quickly enter your home improvement - repair project information and we will contact all the matching local contractors - service pro. Within 1-3 business days you will be receiving free estimates - bids to compare from local contractors. No more letting a stranger in your house just to find out the estimates are above your budget. No more taking time off from work just to let a service pro in your house so contractors can provide you with estimates. We have used the power of the internet and the era of social networking to save you time and make home improvement a little bit simpler a day at a time.

attribute.value: remodeling, construction leads, project bid, independent contractors, builders and contractors, home improvement contractors, general contractors, plumbers, electricians, kitchen remodelers

attribute.name: meta-description
attribute.value: Expensive constractors and other project bid sites got you down? Compare Remodeling Costs, Get Free Bids On Your Project.

attribute.name: footer-content
attribute.value: Welcome to homefellas.com revolutionary new online bid and second opinion feature. We allow you to quickly, through a few simple steps, submit your next home improvement or remodeling project for your best local service pro to review. Within a few hours to a couple of business days you will receive several estimates from matching local contractors to review before you make a smart and educated decision. We encourage you to submit pictures of your current project location and drawing or information photos of the work you would like the contractor to do for you.

attribute.name: footer-content
attribute.value: No more taking time off from the job site just to let write up estimates. attribute.name: h1
attribute.value: List your business and receive FREE leads.

attribute.name: why
attribute.value: Why list your company with us?

attribute.name: step1
attribute.value: 1. You will receive direct leads from customers who find your business listed on HomeFellas.com. HomeFellas.com is a FREE online community connecting customers with contractors; We are NOT a lead generation company! We will NEVER charge you for connecting you with this customer information and NEVER charge you for listing your business with us.

attribute.name: step2
attribute.value: 2. Save your time and money with our fresh online customer screening service.

attribute.name: step3
attribute.value: 3. List your business and be visible to millions on local customers.

attribute.name: step4
attribute.value: 4. Receive FREE online leads directly from our customers.

attribute.name: step5
attribute.value: 5. We'll NEVER charge you per lead like our competitors.

attribute.name: stepfootnote
attribute.value: *Rest assured we will not display your personal contact information with your company listing, nor sell it to a 3rd party.
